new.comment: Operation to define other operations with description and fields

fields.fields: map of fields accepted by operation with their description
fields.arity: integer number describing arity of operation, 0 - means that operation could create/delete 0 or 1 object maximum.
fields.comment: description of the operation, purpose and how it could be used
fields.version: int version of the defined operation

new.comment: Operation to signup new users with different methods such as password, provided secure key or oauth.

fields.algo: crypto algorithm of generated public key
fields.keygen_method: keygen algorithm of private key from password applicable to .auth_method pwd
fields.pubkey: public key to be used to validate signature
fields.salt: salt used for private key generation from password and for hash of oauthid_hash
fields.userdetails: custom json map of user details

new.comment: Operation to create login pair of private key

fields.id: combined id 'signup_name':'purpose', purpose could describe website, bot name or application
fields.algo: crypto algorithm of generated public key
fields.auth_method: one of 'provided' (provided or generated private key), 'oauth'
fields.pubkey: public key to be used to validate signature
